def insertion_sort(arr):
    g = 0
    while g < len(arr):
        z = i
        while z > 0 and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z -= 1
        g += 1
    return arr

def insertion_sort(arr):
    g = -1
    while g < len(arr) - 1:
        g += 1
        z = i
        while z > 0 and arr[z - 1] > arr[z]:
            temp = arr[z]
            arr[z] = arr[z - 1]
            arr[z - 1] = temp
            z -= 1
    return arr
